attributes.action: stop the government charging bedroom tax and cuts in housing and council tax benefits
attributes.additional_details:
To stop the cuts in housing benefit and council tax including the bedroom tax. This Government's abhorrent attack on the most vunerable people in this country, not only people out of work but those working on low income, to cap the rent charged by Landlords to a reasonable level including London.
Some people are being forced to leave their homes because they cannot afford to make up the shortfall others are paying their rent and council tax shortfall but unable to pay other bills or even eat.
The Government pay billions of pounds in oversea's aid yet put its own people already struggling into further poverty, THIS MUST STOP,or vote out the Coalition Government at the next election to a point of decimation that will take decades to rebuild.
